description: Shanta Chaudhary is a social reformer and politician for the CPN (UML) party. A former member of the Constituent Assembly of Nepal, she was previously a forced child labourer as part of the Kamalari system. She was forced into servitude at age eight and was freed at eighteen, after which she became active in politics. Chaudhary was illiterate when first elected in 2008 and subsequently learned to read, publishing a book about her experiences, 'Kamlari Dekhi Sabhasad Samma', in 2013.
short_description: Nepali politician, social reformer, and former forced child labourer who served in the Constituent Assembly of Nepal.
